name: KJT Group Webinars
overview: Aging populations coupled with the rapid changes in home and residential care delivery have led to increased demand for insights. From single location facilities through national facility networks, business decision makers are finding the role of marketing and market research to be critical to success. Beyond site locations, demographics, and other market basics, market research provides long term care management true insights into competitive advantages, new product opportunities, optimized messaging, and a practical means to deal with the ever-changing policy landscape. Learn more about how to leverage these insights in your organization, by joining KJT Group President and Founder, for a 1-hour webinar entitled â€œHome Care through Skilled Nursing Facilities: Leveraging Primary Research to Grow Market Share.â€
